hero.headline: Privacy Policy
hero.subheadline: How we collect, use, store, and protect your information.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.body: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains what we collect, why we collect it, and how we safeguard it.

sections.title: What We Collect
items: Usage data (pages visited, interactions, device info)

sections.title: How We Use Data
items: To respond to inquiries and provide services
To improve site performance and user experience
To send service updates and relevant content (with consent)
To secure our platform and prevent abuse

sections.title: Data Sharing
sections.body: We do not sell your data. We may share data with trusted processors (hosting, analytics, email delivery) under strict agreements and only as needed.

sections.title: Data Retention
sections.body: We retain personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes described or to comply with legal requirements.

sections.title: Your Rights
items: Access, correct, or delete your data

sections.title: Security
sections.body: We use technical and organizational safeguards (encryption in transit, least-privilege access, monitoring) to protect your data.

sections.title: Cookies
sections.body: We use cookies for essential functionality, analytics, and improving user experience. Manage preferences via the cookie banner or browser settings.

sections.title: International Transfers
sections.body: When transferring data internationally, we use appropriate safeguards such as Standard Contractual Clauses where required.

sections.title: Children
sections.body: Our services are not directed to children under 16. We do not knowingly collect data from children.

sections.title: Changes
sections.body: We may update this policy. Material changes will be communicated, and the 'Updated On' date will reflect the latest version.

sections.title: Contact
sections.body: For privacy questions, email privacy@insightexus.com or write to: InsightExus, 123 Tech Street, San Francisco, CA 94105, USA.
